The level of experience, talent, and seemingly impossible dedication to "getting it done, and getting it right" that Phil brings to the table is almost hard to digest. If it were anyone else, the dinner conversation would be awkward, and the over-sized pocket-protector would be doubling as a gravy bib. Yet, floating well above his obvious intelligence and confidence is a refreshing, engaging sense of humility and humor.If your daughter brought Phil home to meet the family over a turkey supper, the only thing you would have to worry about is how quickly he could re-engineer an oven to cook a turkey in nine minutes, and who would own what percentage of the patents (because it was your turkey to begin with).Phil is the rare combination of "brains and beers". He's the guy at the office who you can count on to steadfastly solve and execute the most complicated challenges. But, he's also the guy you can count on for good conversation and compassion over a couple beers at the end of the day. Any organization that is looking for a deeply dedicated, personable, and experienced professional would be hard-pressed to come across anyone as well balanced as Phil.
David Urbanic, ACE
Co-Founder / Video Producer / Photographer at Pilotlight Media
